“Where facts are few, experts are many.” (Donald R. Gannon) What do you think?

“It is not enough to succeed. Others must fail.” (Gore Vidal) What do you think?

“A fashion is nothing but an induced epidemic.” (George Bernard Shaw) What do you think?
“Some of the worst mistakes of my life have been haircuts.” (Jim Morrison) What do you think?

“Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.” (Miguel Ruiz) What do you think?
“It is not fair to ask of others what you are unwilling to do yourself.” (Eleanor Roosevelt) What do you think?
“Woe be to him that reads but one book.” (George Herbert) What do you think?
“It is our choices...that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.” (J. K. Rowling) What do you think?
“To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.” (David Viscott) What do you think?
